title: The Mighty Volga (D)
brief_description: A cruise down the Volga River reveals some of Russia’s interesting sites. Includes newsreel clips of the battle of Stalingrad. WARNING: Contains disturbing footage of fish being “clubbed” in order to keep blood in the abdominal cavity so as to keep the fish alive when it is sliced open to remove the fish eggs for caviar.
